Name: Shots fired in the Dark Forest
About the game: Features of the game: Dark Forest Laser Sight Endless rounds of ammunition Dangerous plants Teleports-TV sets Achievements Complex saws and doors Features of conducting a firefight: You can fire standing, sitting, and jumping! A bullet fired by the main character can stop the enemy's bullet. If you are being shot at, you can crouch or jump. History: The main character is a former military man sent to investigate in a dark forest, where a lot of strange things happen.
